snippet: With Bumgarner scheduled to pitch Sunday, National League Manager Terry Collins turned to one of his own, the Mets’ 19-year veteran Colon, who said the honor “means a lot.”...
abstract: Terry Collins, National League manager in 2016 All-Star Game, selects New York Mets pitcher Bartolo Colon to replace San Francisco Giants pitcher Madison Bumgarner on roster.
lead_paragraph: With Bumgarner scheduled to pitch Sunday, National League Manager Terry Collins turned to one of his own, the Mets’ 19-year veteran Colon, who said the honor “means a lot.”

headline.main: Bartolo Colon Heads to Fourth All-Star Game as Madison Bumgarner’s Replacement
headline.print_headline: Colon to All-Star Game as a Giant’s Replacement
